50th birthday party of David Bowie at Madison Square Garden 09Jan97
David Bowie and Friends
A special birthday celebration
From Madison Square Garden in New York
"Telling Lies"
produced by Cowboy Films in association with Crossroads Films
TVKO distribution distribution.
Concert of David Bowie turns 50
Madison Square Garden in New York
January 9, 1997

Disc One

The 02 Hearts Filthy Lesson

12 Space Oddity
13 Can not Read - Dress recording room
14 The repetition - dressing room recording

Illustrations included
As indicated on the cover, this DVD comes from VHS Promo HBO series. So this is probably better than a VHS master of the issuance, but not as good as a satellite receiver directly to the capture PC.
